title: ‘Finally a Victory’: Pogačar Opens Account on 2025 with Screamer Summit Sprint at UAE Tour
content:
Pogačar moves into GC lead of UAE Emirates-XRG's home race on Jebel Jais summit, Tarling digs deep to hold second-place overall.

Read the full article at ‘Finally a Victory’: Pogačar Opens Account on 2025 with Screamer Summit Sprint at UAE Tour on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
